data.name: GuildBound
data.detailed_description:
FIGHT


  • Dynamic Combat
    Customize your fighting style, switch between bows, spells, swords, axes, greatswords and spears on the fly. Dodge, parry or block enemy attacks.
  • Skill tree
    Unlock powerful spells and abilities, build your character as you want, from stealthy archer to battlemage.
  • Bosses
    Some foes are battle-hardened and will be stronger than others while others are unique bosses that will test your skill.

BUILD


  • Recources
    Fish, farm, mine, chop, loot, trade and craft. Building and maintaining a guild is expensive and will require lots of recources.
  • Building
    Build your own cozy guild hall or make your own fortress with a fully modular building and decorating system
  • Recruiting
    -TBA-

EXPLORE


  • Open World
    Traverse a fantastical open world: explore forgotten ruins, caves, dungeons and ancient civilizations, trade with merchants in cities, and hunt across the open plains, deserts, mountains and forests.
  • Quests
    Around the world you will find many people in need of help. You will also find a lot of contracts and quests requests in the guildhall.
  • Loot
    Find treasure, weapons and armor by killing creatures, exploring, questing and solving mysteries and puzzles. Unique gear will give you amazing perks and stats.

EXPERIENCE


  • Your Guild
    Starting again from from nothing you will need to regain reputation, rebuild your guildhall and recruit companions.
    Take up arms against the other guilds or unite them to fight the greater evil.
  • The other Guilds
    Many wars over recources between the guilds has divided the continent and gave opportunity for other factions to rise.
    There are many other kingdoms and civilisations each having their own ties with the guilds.
  • The Rift
    They have many names: Riftwalkers, Demonspawn, Monsters... All came from the dimensional Rift.
    It has been 50 years since then. It took all the guilds to close it, but many remnants of the endless horde still remain.
    Sages foretold a new rift is forming and this time we wont be able to stop them.
